DOC.brief_title: Early RA MRI Early Intensive Treatment Study
DOC.detailed_description: This study 1-year non-randomized clinical trial . Two group patient ( delay usual care early intensive care ) diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) symptoms onset less 2 year disease modify anti-rheumatic drug ( DMARDs ) naive recruit . Remission reach patient fulfill Boolean criterion .
DOC.criteria: For usual care group : patient least 1 tender swell joint duration symptom less 2 year previous use DMARDs For intensive care group : patient least 1 tender swell joint duration symptom less 2 year previous use DMARDs patient fulfill 2010 ACR/EULAR classification criterion RA patient renal impairment ( dialysis estimate Glomerular Filtration Rate ( eGFR ) < 30 mL/min/1.73m^2 )
